mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT DOC_ID, DOC_NO, DOC_TITLE, DONE_DATE, WRITER_EMP_NAME, SECURE_LEVEL FROM ( SELECT A.DOC_ID, A.DOC_NO, A.DOC_TITLE, A.DONE_DATE, A.SECURE_LEVEL, C.EMP_NAME AS WRITER_EMP_NAME, B.EMP_NO, CASE A.SECURE_LEVEL WHEN 'C' THEN 'D' WHEN 'B' THEN 'C' WHEN 'A' THEN 'B' WHEN 'S' THEN 'A' END AS S_LEVEL FROM DOCUMENTS A INNER JOIN DOCUMENTDETAIL B ON A.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID INNER JOIN EMPLOYEES C ON A.EMP_NO = C.EMP_NO WHERE A.DONE_DATE IS NOT NULL ) WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} OR S_LEVEL >= ( SELECT CASE WHEN POSITION = 0 THEN 'D' WHEN POSITION = 1 THEN 'C' WHEN POSITION >= 2 AND POSITION < 4 THEN 'B' WHEN POSITION >= 4 THEN 'A' END AS P_LEVEL FROM EMPLOYEES WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo}) ORDER BY DONE_DATE
